SEARCH
Module pizzeria.rupizzeria
Package pizzeria

Class StartingMenuController

java.lang.Object
pizzeria.StartingMenuController
public class StartingMenuController extends Object
Controller for the Starting Menu View. This class handles the user interactions and updates the view accordingly.
Author:
Pranav Sudheer and Pranav Komarla

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller. Sets up the initial state of the view components and initializes the order number, pizzas, and orders.

    • openChicagoStyle

      private void openChicagoStyle() throws IOException
      Opens the Chicago Style Pizza view. Loads the FXML file and sets the main controller.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the FXML file cannot be loaded

    • openNYStyle

      private void openNYStyle() throws IOException
      Opens the New York Style Pizza view. Loads the FXML file and sets the main controller.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the FXML file cannot be loaded

      public void addOrder()
